title: About Me
paragraphs: With 2.5+ years of hands-on experience in React Native, I’ve built 10+ cross-platform apps serving 20K+ active users with consistent 4.5★+ ratings.
Starting as a Full-Stack Developer with React.js and Next.js, I crafted responsive web apps with 95+ PageSpeed scores, which laid a strong foundation for building smooth, high-performing mobile apps.
I’m passionate about performance optimization, clean architecture, and mentoring developers. In Agile setups, I’ve implemented CI/CD pipelines that cut deployment time by 60%.
